Package sprites

Class Creature

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
      • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
        • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double
          • sprites.Sprite
            • sprites.MovingSprite
              • sprites.Creature
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Damageable, Drawable, Removable, java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Hero, Monster
    public abstract class Creature
extends MovingSprite
implements Damageable
    Represents a creature class, with the help of Shelby's Animation Demo for collision detection. It also animates the creatures.
    Version:
    5/21/18
    Author:
    Ben
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Creature

        public Creature​(double x,
                double y,
                double w,
                double h,
                java.lang.String animationKey)
        Creates a new creature. It's state is currently standing when created. It will stay 2 frames on each picture by defualt.
        Parameters:
        x - - sprite x location
        y - - sprite y location
        w - - sprite width
        h - -sprite height
        worldlyThings - - everything that this sprite can collide with
        animationKey - - what pictures you want to load
